item.title: A rule
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

In my experience, people generally speak in a different language on the server if they only want one other person or so who also knows the language to understand them, and that is what a PM is for.

Also, English is growing to be more and more a universal language, maybe it isn’t the first language where minecraft is written, but what language does the creator write the game, the websites, his ‘tweets’, youtube videos and such in? That’s right, English. I wouldn’t join a spanish speaking server and expect everyone to allow me to speak english whenever I wanted, and no one else should do the same on this server.

And yes, we aren’t talking banning, just mutes.
